title: Gravity Vortex (Part 3)
body:
Gravity Vortex (Part 3)

Thud!

Evan cancelled his shadow nail skill and Jack's lifeless body dropped to the ground.

After killing Jack, Evan looked at Adam and found him staring blankly at Jack's body. It was like he was having a hard time believing that his son is dead.

Soon Adam's body started to shake and a white aura started to come out of his body, his eyes turned blood red and he looked at Evan with hate filled eyes.

'Here it comes' Evan narrowed his eyes when he felt Adam's chaotic aura.

"You bastard, I'll kill you," Adam bellowed, and the force of gravity instantly skyrocketed over an area of ​​over two kilometres.

Evan felt his surroundings become heavy, and he almost fell to the ground because of the high pressure.
